Tow Check Project

An iOS Project

About the project

Chicago Tow Check helps Chicagoans find their towed vehicles. CTC covers both vehicles that have been toweed and impounded or simply relocated to a new address on an emergency basis. Search for your car via license plate or by looking through recently towed vehicles. CTC provides the phone number to the auto-pound, directions, location information, relocation reason, inventory number, and a share feature. The app also provides information about the recovery process, including potetnial fees and legal recourse for contesting a tow. Dark Mode. Dynamic Type.
